name: SushiSandbox
title: Sushi Sandbox
description: This is a sushi sandbox for creation of resources and examples

resource.name: Argonaut Patient List (Group) Profile
resource.description: Profile on the R4 Group resource to for [Argonaut Patient List Project](https://confluence.hl7.org/display/AP/Argonaut+Project+Home).  Note that the [Group](http://hl7.org/fhir/group.html) resource is used for this patient **list** use case even though there is also a FHIR List resource

resource.name: Argonaut Patient List Questionnaire
resource.description: A reference to a form definition that is bound to certain types of lists and defines each column for the purpose of providing additional data for each member

resource.name: Argonaut Patient List QuestionnaireResponse
resource.description: A reference to a QuestionnaireResponse of prepopulated data based on a Patient List Questionnaire that is bound to certain types of lists and provides additional data for a Group.member

resource.name: Argonaut Group Characteristic Value Set
resource.description: Used to define group characteristic and limited to 'location'or....

resource.name: Argonaut Group Characteristic Code System
resource.description: Used to define group characteristic and limited to 'location'or 'team' or 'organization' or 'practitioner'
This CapabilityStatement is a test of implementationGuide
resource.name: Test

resource.description:
This operation is used to submit an unsolicited claims attachment as a single claim (or simply a reference to a claim) and other referenced resources as attachments for processing. The input parameters are:
  1.  Data elements for reassociation to the Claim
      1. Attachment Control Number (ACN)
      1. Billed Amount/Charged Amount
      1. Claim #
      1. Patient
      1. Coverage
      1. Encounter
      1. Provider
      1. Organization

      If a FHIR or X12 representation of Claim is sent with attachment, then these data elements are not needed for reassociation.

  1.  the claim either as:
      1.  ASC X12N 278 (Health Care Services Review â€” Notification and Acknowledgment) and an ASC X12N 275 (Additional Information to Support a Health Care Services Review) or
      1.  Claim resource.

  1. Attachments as FHIR Resources to support the claims review.

There are no output parameters.
resource.name: Unsolicited Claims Attachment Operation

resource.description: Profile on the R4 Group resource to for [Argonaut Patient List Project](https://confluence.hl7.org/display/AP/Argonaut+Project+Home).  Note that the [Group](http://hl7.org/fhir/group.html) resource is used for this patient **list** use case even though there is also a FHIR List resource
resource.name: Argonaut Patient List (Group) Profile

resource.description: The modality whereby the measure is obtained.  Choice of sensed|self-reported. This extension and concepts orginally created for Open mHealth (https://www.openmhealth.org/)
resource.name: Modality Extension

resource.description: Defines a "mixin" profile which constrains and extends the Observation resource for the minimal set of data to support to writing patient submitted Observations to an EHR.  This profile is intended to be used in addition to other Observation Profiles such as the [US Core Body Weight Profile](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition-us-core-body-weight.html). When an application is creating content, it must create content that conforms to both sets of profiles - that is, the intersection of the profiles. When an application is consuming information, then it must be able to consume content that conforms to either set of profiles - that is, the union of the profiles. For additional guidance see [Supporting Multiple Profiles](http://hl7.org/fhir/profiling.html#mixing) in the FHIR specification.
resource.name: Argo Write Observation Profile

resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the RelatedPerson resource on the patient resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve demographic information.
resource.name: US Core Related Person

resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the ServiceRequest resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve orders associated with diagnostic and clinical tests and clinical interventions for a patient
resource.name: US Core Service Request
